text: The 2019 North Texas SC season is the first season for North Texas SC's existence, and their first in USL League One, the third tier of professional soccer in the United States and Canada. == Background == On November 2, 2018, it was announced by FC Dallas that Dallas would be granted a side to play in the newly created United Soccer League third division for 2019. The club then officially announced the name of the reserve side, North Texas SC, and crest on December 6, 2018. == Club == === Roster === As of March 31, 2019. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! friendlies === === Midseason friendlies === == Competitive == === USL League One === ==== Standings ==== ==== Results ==== ==== USL League One Playoffs ==== === U.S. Open Cup === Due to their ownership by a more advanced level professional club (FC Dallas), North Texas SC was one of 13 teams expressly forbidden from entering the Cup competition. == Transfers == === FC Dallas loanees ===
